SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT T1.ENTRPS_NM ,' ' AS RM ,MIN(T1.DEAL_RELATE) AS DEAL_RELATE ,MIN(T1.INDUTY) AS INDUTY ,MIN(T1.RPRSNTV) AS RPRSNTV ,MIN(T1.TLPHON_NO) AS TLPHON_NO ,MIN(T1.FAX_NO) AS FAX_NO ,MIN(T1.POST_NO) AS POST_NO ,MIN(T1.ROADNM_ADRES) AS ROADNM_ADRES ,MIN(T1.LNM_ADRES) AS LNM_ADRES ,MIN(T1.STPL_PRDLST) AS STPL_PRDLST ,MIN(T1.BSNM_NO) AS BSNM_NO ,MIN(T1.CHARGER) AS CHARGER ,MIN(T1.CHARGER_OFC_POS) AS CHARGER_OFC_POS ,MIN(T1.CHARGER_MOBLPHON_NO) AS CHARGER_MOBLPHON_NO ,MIN(T1.CHARGER_EMAIL) AS CHARGER_EMAIL ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.CTRT_DT >= TO_DATE(#sPrevCtrtYr# || '0101000000','YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND T2.CTRT_DT <= TO_DATE(#sPrevCtrtYr# || '1231235959','YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') THEN NVL(T2.CTRT_AMT,0) * NVL(T1.QOTA_RATE,0) END),0),'9,999,999,999,999,990')) AS PREV_CTRT_AMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.CTRT_DT >= TO_DATE(#sCtrtYr# || '0101000000','YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND T2.CTRT_DT <= TO_DATE(#sCtrtYr# || '1231235959','YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') THEN NVL(T2.CTRT_AMT,0) * NVL(T1.QOTA_RATE,0) END),0),'9,999,999,999,999,990')) AS CURR_CTRT_AMT FROM CTRT_JOIN_CONTR_F T1 INNER JOIN CTRT_INFO_F T2 ON (T1.CTRT_NO = T2.CTRT_NO) WHERE 1 = 1
AND T2.CTRT_SE = #sCtrtSe#
AND T2.CTRT_NM LIKE '%' || #sCtrtNm# || '%'
AND T2.CTRT_DT >= TO_DATE(#sPrevCtrtYr# || '0101000000','YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND T2.CTRT_DT <= TO_DATE(#sCtrtYr# || '1231235959','YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')
AND T1.REGIST_ENTRPS_CD = #sRegistEntrpsCd#
AND T1.CTRT_DT >= TO_DATE(#sStartCtrtDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND T1.CTRT_DT < TO_DATE(#sEndCtrtDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1
AND T1.CTRT_AMT >= NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#sStartCtrtAmt#,',','')),0)
AND T1.CTRT_AMT <= NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#sEndCtrtAmt#,',','')),0)
GROUP BY T1.ENTRPS_NM ORDER BY T1.ENTRPS_NM ) S ) T
WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT TO_CHAR(NVL(COUNT(*),0),'999,999,999,999,999') AS TOTAL_COUNT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.CTRT_DT >= TO_DATE(#sPrevCtrtYr# || '0101000000','YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND T2.CTRT_DT <= TO_DATE(#sPrevCtrtYr# || '1231235959','YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') THEN NVL(T2.CTRT_AMT,0) * NVL(T1.QOTA_RATE,0) END),0),'9,999,999,999,999,990')) AS SUM_PREV_CTRT_AMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.CTRT_DT >= TO_DATE(#sCtrtYr# || '0101000000','YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND T2.CTRT_DT <= TO_DATE(#sCtrtYr# || '1231235959','YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') THEN NVL(T2.CTRT_AMT,0) * NVL(T1.QOTA_RATE,0) END),0),'9,999,999,999,999,990')) AS SUM_CURR_CTRT_AMT FROM CTRT_JOIN_CONTR_F T1 INNER JOIN CTRT_INFO_F T2 ON (T1.CTRT_NO = T2.CTRT_NO) WHERE 1 = 1
AND T2.CTRT_SE = #sCtrtSe#
AND T2.CTRT_NM LIKE '%' || #sCtrtNm# || '%'
AND T1.REGIST_ENTRPS_CD = #sRegistEntrpsCd#
AND T2.CTRT_DT >= TO_DATE(#sPrevCtrtYr# || '0101000000','YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND T2.CTRT_DT <= TO_DATE(#sCtrtYr# || '1231235959','YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')
AND T1.CTRT_DT >= TO_DATE(#sStartCtrtDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND T1.CTRT_DT < TO_DATE(#sEndCtrtDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1
AND T1.CTRT_AMT >= NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#sStartCtrtAmt#,',','')),0)
AND T1.CTRT_AMT <= NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#sEndCtrtAmt#,',','')),0)
SELECT ENTRPS_NM ,RPRSNTV_NM ,BIZRNO ,INDUTY ,TLPHON_NO ,FAX ,ZIP ,ADRES FROM ENTRPS_INFO_F WHERE ENTRPSCD = #sEntrpscd#
